content: half_double_crochet in ea half_double_crochet to first corner in corner work 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet *half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet to next corner in corner work 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-2 48 half_double_crochet cut color b leaving 6 tail for weaving in round 5 join color c in same st where last round ended chain 1 single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet across to first corner in corner work 3 single_crochet *single_crochet across to next corner work 3 single_crochet in corner repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 56 single_crochet round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet to center single_crochet of first corner in corner single_crochet work 3 single_crochet *single_crochet in ea single_crochet to center single_crochet of next corner in corner work 3 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 64 single_crochet cut color c leaving 6 tail for weaving in round 7 join color b in same st where last round ended chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea single_crochet to first corner in corner work 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet *half_double_crochet in ea single_crochet to next corner in corner work 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-2 76 half_double_crochet round 8 chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea half_double_crochet to first corner in corner work 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet *half_double_crochet in ea half_double_crochet to next corner in corner work 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * around changing color at end of round by drawing color a through for slip_stitch in top of beg chain-2 drop color b but do not cut it 92 half_double_crochet round 9 with color a chain 1 single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet to first corner in corner work 3 single_crochet *single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet to next corner in corner work 3 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch by pulling color b through drop color a and cut it leaving 6 tail for weaving in 104 single_crochet round 10 cont with color b work single_crochet in back loop only blo of ea single_crochet to first corner in corner work 3 single_crochet *single_crochet in blo of ea single_crochet to next corner in corner work 3 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 112 single_crochet round 11 working through both loops as normal chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea single_crochet to first corner in corner work 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet *half_double_crochet in ea single_crochet to next corner in corner work 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-2 124 half_double_crochet round 12 repeat round 11 140 half_double_crochet at end of round 12 cut color b leaving 6 tail for weaving in round 13 join color c in same st where last round ended chain 1 single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet to first corner in corner work 3 single_crochet *single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet to next corner in corner work 3
